channel.title: Xbox 360 Modding
channel.description: Quite a few people I know have just had this done, does anyone have their xbox modded and have feedback on the possible risks (pros and cons)?

item.title: Xbox 360 Modding
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Harbor Freight Tools

34 Pc Multi-Bit Precision Screwdriver Set

The 34 piece precision screwdriver set is ideal for small-scale jobs like computer or electronics repair. The hardened nickel chrome molybdenum driver bits hold up under heavy use. The comfort-grip handle extends from 5-1/8 in. to 7 in. for...

Is the set of screwdriver/bits I have, just for reference to anyone else who is looking for a good set at a decent price. It has T8, T9, T10
http://www.dealextreme.com/details.dx/sku.6116

I also have one of these, and at that price it’s a great deal.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 Modding
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

You will need a Torx 8 and 10. The screws are actually 9 and 12 but those sizes are near impossible to find.

Buy an xbox opening kit off ebay, saves me so much work everytime.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 Modding
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

thanks, going to buy screwdriver tomorrow will post with feedback.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 Modding
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:73, topic:303732”]After the faceplate has been removed? I haven’t taken it apart yet so I cannot say, what does it mean if the cable is yellow? a LiteOn drive?[/quote]Exactly. That llama page is a little outdated You don’t need any tools for removing the faceplate just get a firm grip from the usb door and pull the faceplate off.

E: This pdf should have everything explained in flashing a x360 dvd drive

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 Modding
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

Any hardware store will have them. You’ll need a torx size 10. What dvd drive do you have? http://www.llamma.com/xbox360/Xbox_360_DVD_Drive_Comparison.htm

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 Modding
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Well the reason I would want to mod my xbox is to play copied games, I am going to use newbiehackers applications to modify game saves too as it seems quite an interesting concept. Can I buy a torx screwdriver from my nearest DIY store or is it a special tool I have to order online?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

Ollie it depends what you want your xbox to do. But for openin i just use a pen and a torx screwdriver to open it up.

item.title: Xbox 360 Modding
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

I’m a new to modding scene, I would like to mod my xbox! where can I buy the tools to open it up? Or can I use standard household items (I have a small repair toolkit for use around the house). I have the xbox elite and I don’t use XBL.

I downloaded an ebook which I have read but would like any advice if you have actually done it yourself.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede

TechnoClunge <3
Yeah like newbiehacker said you have to have low kernel and cb for the jtag to work

item.title: Xbox 360 Modding
item.dc:creator: @newbiehacker newbiehacker
item.description:
@newbiehacker wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:59, topic:303732”][quote author=Teh Spede link=topic=400023.msg3206080#msg3206080 date=1273831444]

What the fuck is and hdd drive mod?

You can use burned disks as games. Such as burning an xbox 360 disk on a blank cd, you xbox can play it.
[/quote]What does the hdd have to do with burned disks? :rolleyes:

I meant disk drive sorry -.-

[quote author=the bank link=topic=400023.msg3205884#msg3205884 date=1273801249]

Most likely now adays, its very easy to “Jtag” your xbox or do a hdd drive mod (play burned games) It simply requires uploading software from your computer to your xbox, and re-wiring your xbox 360 around. (or you can chip it, which is detectable)

As for opening your xbox 360. It takes about 1-2 minutes depending if your good with these sorts of things.
[/quote]BAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA. Stop talking please.

Hmm i’m sure i know more about any of this than you do.[/quote]

Rofls, clearly not. Any xbox that has had recent updates applied are impossible to jtag as microsoft released a kernel update to fix the timing hack. If you know more about this than he, you would have known this.

Read full topic

Most likely now adays, its very easy to “Jtag” your xbox or do a hdd drive mod (play burned games) It simply requires uploading software from your computer to your xbox, and re-wiring your xbox 360 around. (or you can chip it, which is detectable)

As for opening your xbox 360. It takes about 1-2 minutes depending if your good with these sorts of things.
